summary: Complete responsiveness and media upload testing. All responsive breakpoints (375px mobile, 768px tablet, 1920px desktop) tested successfully. Upload API /api/upload and media serving /api/media/ both working correctly.

backend: GET /api/ - API root accessible with 'Matrix News API v2' message
GET /api/categories - Returns 5 categories (Actualité, Politique, Sport, Technologie, Économie)
POST /api/auth/login - Admin login successful with admin@example.com
POST /api/upload - JPG image upload returns URL with /api/media/images/ path
POST /api/upload - Invalid file type (text/plain) rejected with 400
POST /api/articles - Article with uploaded cover image created successfully
GET /api/properties - Properties endpoint returns paginated results

mobile_375px: Hamburger menu visible for guest users (data-testid=hamburger-menu-btn)
Hamburger menu opens dropdown with login link
Mobile search input opens on click
tablet_768px: Header with full search bar visible
desktop_1920px: Full header with MATRIX NEWS text visible
Footer with 4 columns: Brand, Actualités, Immobilier GIMO, Contact

frontend_pages: Homepage - Hero section responsive, ArticleCards stacked on mobile
ImmobilierPage - Hero 'IMMOBILIER GUINÉE' visible, property filters visible
PropertyCard - VENTE badge, price in GNF, 'Voir détails' and 'Contacter' buttons
Footer - 4 columns on desktop, 2 columns on mobile, social icons, legal links
media_upload: ArticleFormPage - Cover image upload input exists (data-testid=cover-image-upload)
Title input, category select, submit button present

seed_data_creation: Test articles with uploaded images created and cleaned up during tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: All responsiveness and upload features verified working. Upload endpoint at POST /api/upload accepts JPG/PNG/WEBP images (max 5MB) and MP4/WebM videos (max 20MB). Uploaded files served from /api/media/images/ and /api/media/videos/. Test property 'Villa 4 chambres à Kipé' (500M GNF) exists in Immobilier section.
